title: Top companies and GPA
content:
ive sen alot of posts saying top companies ask for higher cgpa but in the placement sheet ive seen like 7+ so do top companies mean faang?

anddd my gpa is close to 8.5, am i cooked?

comments.body: Only companies like Walmart and Cloudera shortlisted 9+.  Other top companies like Apple, Visa, Oracle etc. went with 8+ or 8.5+ but it might be different for future batches.
so the % of companies asking for 9+ is  pretty less ?
Yea I'd say a maximum of 10 companies asked for a cgpa of 9+
How's the job market for freshers ? Like if you are average you should be able to get something or the other by the end right ?
bro looking at the placement sheet i think ya
So suppose if I have a cgpa of 9+ , do i qualify for the companies asking for 9+ and for the companies asking for 8+ ? ( chances of getting placed increased ? )
ya u get qualified for both 9+ and 8+ companies
People keep saying that even though the cuttoff is this much but you do get filtered out when complared to ppl with gpa 9ish,how true is this?
